name: Find your way home
description:
The aim of our project was to create a working VR Prototype on Google Cardboard that allows players to navigate a VR space by using mostly sound.

Players can navigate the VR space by using a button to walk in the direction they're looking. Special attention was placed on making movement pleasant.

Being able to locate the source of a sound in 3D space gives a very deep sense of presence and adds to the immersion, even on entry level VR hardware.
